item.title: Delicacy
item.description: Some delicacy This is one of most famous chinese food called Shaomai (Steamed Pork Dumplings) The special food called hundun. jianjiao(Dumplings)

item.title: Trips
item.description: In October 2022 Iâ€™ve visited Chaohu, Anhui province in china with my classmates for a week. We drove a lot through the beautiful natural scenery and saw a lot of different rocks: basal conglomerate, siltsstone, shale, bioclastic limestone.
